Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)
= a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= state of being considered fortunate and blessed by God; ≈ accompanied by an attitude of admiration

Node.gloss: to consider|to ponder|to observe|to take note of|to have regard for|to give heed to|to study
Node.definition: = action by which humans think about someone or something accompanied by a willingness to translate their conclusions into action if needed
= a person or class of people that lack the means to support themselves; ≈ thereby often despised or mistreated, but being under God's protection

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary

Node.gloss: to keep alive|to restore to life
Node.definition: = to cause an object to become or remain alive and well; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in most cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= to communicate to someone else that you consider him/her or someone else fortunate and blessed by God; ≈ accompanied by an attitude of respect

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a low platform standing on four legs, a bit longer than the length of a man, and about 70 80 centimeters wide
= state of ill health
= causative process by which humans or deities give events a different nature
= state in which humans are lacking physical strength, ◄ as a result of sickness or injury
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to be gracious|to pity
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly

= causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident; this could also refer to the wound or disease itself

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= action by which humans refer to a particular object when speaking
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong

= reference to an unknown point in time; ► normally used with the purpose of finding out which point in time is intended; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that this point of time may never arrive
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.gloss: to perish|to come to an end
Node.definition: = process by which an event comes to an end, usually under unfavorable circumstances
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
literally: falsehood; hence: = state in which things that are being communicated are factually untrue

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= causative action by which humans gather different types of information in order to compile it into a story
= great wickedness and depravity, as a trait of certain human beings, which is expressed in thoughts, words, and actions; ≈ regarded as unacceptable and worthy of punishment by God

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= referent to the location outside of an object

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event
= action by which people talk softly among themselves to keep others from overhearing
= person who experiences hostily towards someone else and acts accordingly
= action by which humans or deities exercise their minds in order to determine a course of action that will achieve a certain purpose
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior
= state that is likely to result in death ◄ as a consequence of bad behavior
literally: to be poured on someone; hence: = process by which humans become the victim of unfortunate circumstances ◄ as if it were a liquid poured upon that person
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security
= process by which an action is repeated or continued

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
literally: to make great (one's) heel (over someone else); hence, possibly: = action by which humans speak lies about other humans
= the back part of the foot of humans and animals below the ankle
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

Node.gloss: to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to be gracious|to pity
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= state in which humans and deities are emotionally attached to (other) humans
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.gloss: to cause to stand|to set (up)|to put|to place
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause a person, animal or inanimate object to be in a certain location, usually in an upright position
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= marker expressing a speaker's solemn confirmation of the truth of a statement
= marker expressing a speaker's solemn confirmation of the truth of a statement
